H0.text: Where did the Shinning Path terrorists operate. Colombia

H1.text: Where did the Shinning Path terrorists operate. Bolivia

H2.text: Where did the Shinning Path terrorists operate. Ecuador

H3.text: Where did the Shinning Path terrorists operate. Peru

A4.text: In one of its last attacks in Lima, on 16 July 1992, the Shining Path detonated a powerful bomb on Tarata Street in the Miraflores District, full of civilian adults and children, killing 25 people and injuring an additional 155.

A5.text: This action has come to be known as the Lucanamarca massacre.
